value.title: Code-free machine learning: AutoML with AutoGluon, Amazon SageMaker, and AWS Lambda
value.excerpt: One of AWS’s goals is to put machine learning (ML) in the hands of every developer. value.title: ProBeat: Slowing AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud revenue growth is a good thing

value.title: US Army's conversational AI system to get soldiers and robots talking
value.excerpt: The US Army is working on a soldier-robot interface that uses spoke dialogue to control joint tasks in real-time. The Joint Understanding and Dialogue Interface (JUDI) is designed to reduce training costs while improving soldier/robot teamwork.
